instruction: Design a customer loyalty program for online shoppers with the given information.
output: Our customer loyalty program for Millennial shoppers will reward them for shopping online with us. We plan to offer exclusive discounts, loyalty points for every purchase, free shipping and return options, and early access to new products. We can also offer special incentives such as sweepstakes and referral rewards. We believe this program will help to retain existing customers and encourage them to purchase more frequently.
